segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to get a package of cigarette .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you a taste for this kind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , this kind of cigarette is too strong for me , I desire a mild one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It suits my taste , I'll take it . Do you have lighters ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a lot of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Show me the one made of plastic .
segments.speaker: S2
